title: New game mode idea!
body:
So legend of the poro king got me thinking about new game modes, anybody else think it'd be cool to have a mode,  that you never stop leveling in, you gain passive xp, more passive gold than aram, have like 10 items slots, and you just dont stop leveling, it'd be preferable on twisted treeline as a 5v5 queue in my opinion :)

any thoughts?

replies.body: Tanks especially will be near unkillable.
how hilarious would it be to see a lvl 30 volibear with thornmail and like 4 warmongs 1v1 a yi with armour pen though XD

Haha, 10 minute teamfights compared to 20 seconds.

If Atmas Impaler still existed (RIP2sooncrierytiem) that item would be a sure buy for everyone.
you would run out of things to buy ._.
imagine a typical singed build 200 armor/ 100mr 4k hp 250 ap. now add 4 more rod of ages :/
Well if the champions never stop leveling up, then I'd hate to see any tank/assassin reach anything over 25
I actually think that snowdown map should replace ARAM, ARAM is %%%%.
